text: Elutappatta katitattaic curuttuvataip pol nam vanattaic curuttum nalai (napiye!) Nir avarkalukku napakamuttuviraka. Mutal tatavai nam avarkalai pataittatu ponre (annalil) nam (avarkalukku uyir kotuttu) avarkalai milavaippom. Itu nam'mitu katamaiyanatoru vakkurutiyakum. Niccayamaka nam itaic ceyte tiruvom
